keyword: how many calories in mini cucumbers
title: How Many Calories in Mini Cucumbers?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in mini cucumbers per serving, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and nutrition tweaks for your diet.
h1: How Many Calories in Mini Cucumbers?
assumptions: Raw, fresh mini cucumbers (Persian-style, ~50 g each), with skin, no added dressings or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, size, freshness, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for exact values when available.

quick_answer.text: One mini cucumber has about 8 calories and is mostly water with some fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: In a salad with 1 tsp olive oil

faqs.q: How many calories in one mini cucumber?
faqs.a: About 8 kcal for one mini cucumber (~50 g).

faqs.q: Are mini cucumbers low in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, ~1.8 g carbs per mini cucumber, mostly from natural sugars and fiber.

faqs.q: Do mini cucumbers have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimalâ€”0.3 g protein and 0.1 g fat per mini cucumber.

faqs.q: How does mini cucumber nutrition compare to regular cucumbers?
faqs.a: Similar per gram; minis are smaller, so lower totals but same low-cal profile.

faqs.q: Can mini cucumbers help with hydration?
faqs.a: Yes, they're 95% water, with ~8 kcal and 0.3 g fiber per mini cucumber.
